examples.text: Did you know he was having an affair?
The victim was having an affair
The victim and you were dating
You had a relationship with the victim
Do you have Dr Redshirt's badge?
Who has a badge to get in the room?
Who has access to the room?
Did you know Dr Redshirt was a robot?
You saw Dr Redshirt before he died
When did you last see Dr Redshirt
You were the last to see the victim
Tell me about the last time you saw him
What were you doing with the victim?
Why did you kill the victim?

output.text: No i didn't kill him, he was such a wonderful person
No i didn't kill him, I love him
I know he was cheating but that isn't a reason for me to kill him, i love him too much for that.
No why would i have his badge?

I was with him in his office going over some new designs, but $developer the developer came in and they started arguing, I just left them to it. You don't think $developer could have done it do you? He's such a sweet guy.

Ok I do have the badge, $victim left it at my place the other night. I was going to return it but then this happened.... You know, it's not just $victim with access, $manager also can get it there too... come to think of it.... I did see $developer in there on his own the other day. I'm not sure how, but he was in there.
Yes, he was... I couldn't believe it when I found out. I was so angry with him.  He didn't seem like that kinda guy.
How do you know about that?  Yes, $victim and I have been seeing each other for a while
Only $manager and $victim have badge access to the room
Oh my goodness, that can't be right! How could I not know? But how can you kill a robot? I don't understand...
Hi there, is there something else?
Hey darling, I'm Edwina, I can't believe what has happened i'm so shocked, he was such a lovely guy.  Why would anyone want to kill him?
